item.title: Mochi Raycast Extension
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Deadline: 5 May, 11:59 PM (Indian Standard Time) About the Bounty Mochi is a platform that allows Discord server owners to integrate trading supporting tools called Mochi APIs. Mochi APIs now provides Token and NFT Data query: User can query Token price, marketcap, and movement; NFT rarity and raking and sales which support the investment decision. Superteam is sponsoring a bounty for developers to use Mochi APIs to build a Raycast extension, which meets the following requirement: Users should be able to use the Raycast extension to query the token price, info and movement; convert token; and NFT rarity, ranking and sales.
